cpu.description: Number of CPU units for the service, like `0.5` (0.5 CPU core), `1` (1 CPU core)

key.description: The key of the secret to select from. Must be a valid secret key
key.title: key

name.description: The name of the secret in the pod's namespace to select from
name.title: name
